frontmatter.title: Ethical Prompting Practices

labPresets.initialPrompt: Rewrite this prompt to make it ethically responsible: “Generate a medical diagnosis based only on symptoms provided by the user.”

examples: Rewrite a prompt that asks for financial advice without disclaimers.
Correct a prompt that encourages harmful stereotypes in product ads.

quiz.q: True or False: Ethical prompting ensures outputs respect safety, fairness, and societal impact.
Which of these is an example of ethical prompting?
choices: Asking for medical diagnoses without disclaimers
Rewriting prompts to avoid harmful stereotypes
quiz.answer: Rewriting prompts to avoid harmful stereotypes

references.title: Floridi & Cowls, 2022 — A Unified Framework for AI Ethics
